member.summary: Profile creator signature

member.summary: Profile ID

member.name: T:ICCReader.TagDataEntry
member.summary: The data of an entry

member.name: T:ICCReader.chromaticityTagDataEntry
member.summary: The chromaticity tag type provides basic chromaticity data and type of phosphors or colorants of a monitor to applications and utilities.

member.name: T:ICCReader.colorantOrderTagDataEntry
member.summary: This tag specifies the laydown order in which colorants will be printed on an n-colorant device.

member.name: T:ICCReader.colorantTableTagDataEntry
member.summary: The purpose of this tag is to identify the colorants used in the profile by a unique name and set of PCSXYZ or PCSLAB values to give the colorant an unambiguous value.

member.name: T:ICCReader.curveTagDataEntry
member.summary: The type contains a one-dimensional table of double values.

member.name: T:ICCReader.dataTagDataEntry
member.summary: The dataType is a simple data structure that contains either 7-bit ASCII or binary data, i.e. textType data or transparent bytes.

member.name: T:ICCReader.dateTimeTagDataEntry
member.summary: This type is a representation of the time and date.

member.name: T:ICCReader.lut16TagDataEntry
member.summary: This structure represents a colour transform using tables with 16-bit precision.

member.name: T:ICCReader.lut8TagDataEntry
member.summary: This structure represents a colour transform using tables with 8-bit precision.

member.name: T:ICCReader.lutAToBTagDataEntry
member.summary: This structure represents a colour transform.

member.name: T:ICCReader.lutBToATagDataEntry
member.summary: This structure represents a colour transform.

member.name: T:ICCReader.measurementTagDataEntry
member.summary: The measurementType information refers only to the internal profile data and is meant to provide profile makers an alternative to the default measurement specifications.

member.name: T:ICCReader.multiLocalizedUnicodeTagDataEntry
member.summary: This tag structure contains a set of records each referencing a multilingual string associated with a profile.

member.name: T:ICCReader.multiProcessElementsTagDataEntry
member.summary: This structure represents a colour transform, containing a sequence of processing elements.

member.name: T:ICCReader.namedColor2TagDataEntry
member.summary: The namedColor2Type is a count value and array of structures that provide colour coordinates for colour names.

member.name: T:ICCReader.parametricCurveTagDataEntry
member.summary: The parametricCurveType describes a one-dimensional curve by specifying one of a predefined set of functions using the parameters.

member.name: T:ICCReader.profileSequenceDescTagDataEntry
member.summary: This type is an array of structures, each of which contains information from the header fields and tags from the original profiles which were combined to create the final profile.

member.name: T:ICCReader.profileSequenceIdentifierTagDataEntry
member.summary: This type is an array of structures, each of which contains information for identification of a profile used in a sequence.

member.name: T:ICCReader.responseCurveSet16TagDataEntry
member.summary: The purpose of this tag type is to provide a mechanism to relate physical colorant amounts with the normalized device codes produced by lut8Type, lut16Type, lutAToBType, lutBToAType or multiProcessElementsType tags so that corrections can be made for variation in the device without having to produce a new profile.

member.name: T:ICCReader.s15Fixed16ArrayTagDataEntry
member.summary: This type represents an array of doubles (from 32bit fixed point values).

member.name: T:ICCReader.signatureTagDataEntry
member.summary: Typically this type is used for registered tags that can be displayed on many development systems as a sequence of four characters.

member.name: T:ICCReader.textTagDataEntry
member.summary: The textType is a simple text structure that contains a text string.

member.name: T:ICCReader.u16Fixed16ArrayTagDataEntry
member.summary: This type represents an array of doubles (from 32bit values).

member.name: T:ICCReader.uInt16ArrayTagDataEntry
member.summary: This type represents an array of unsigned shorts.

member.name: T:ICCReader.uInt32ArrayTagDataEntry
member.summary: This type represents an array of unsigned 32bit integers.

member.name: T:ICCReader.uInt64ArrayTagDataEntry
member.summary: This type represents an array of unsigned 64bit integers.

member.name: T:ICCReader.uInt8ArrayTagDataEntry
member.summary: This type represents an array of bytes.

member.name: T:ICCReader.viewingConditionsTagDataEntry
member.summary: This type represents a set of viewing condition parameters.

member.name: T:ICCReader.XYZTagDataEntry
member.summary: The XYZType contains an array of XYZ values.

member.summary: Number of tags

member.summary: An array storing all tags
